body: Planes with this trait permit only the use of spells and spell-like abilities that meet particular qualifications. Magic can be limited to effects from certain schools or subschools, effects with certain descriptors, or effects of a certain level (or any combination of these qualities). Spells and spell-like abilities that don't meet the qualifications simply don't work.
url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Planar Adventures/Planar Traits/Magic Traits/Limited Magic
name: Limited Magic
